name: College Gay Sex - Episode 3
description:
An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD graphics, steamy ANIMATIONS, and realistic-looking characters.
Cody’s journey as a gay college student continues with an intense menage at the gym as Jax recruits a senior student to help them train for the football team.

GAME DESCRIPTION

EPISODE 3

Determined to secure spots on the college football team, Jax recruits a senior student to help him and Cody regain their fitness levels. Reluctant at first, Cody quickly changes his mind when he discovers that the trainer is none other than Matt Sparks, the notorious player who was expelled from the team due to indecent behavior in the locker room.

The evidence of Matt’s scandalous affair caused quite a commotion across campus, and Cody couldn’t shake the image of that juicy ass out of his mind. He needs to have him and sees Jax's offer as the perfect opportunity to pursue his longing for Matt.

Will our college boys get what they want from the trainer?
Follow the story and find out!

FEATURES

- HD renders and animations
- Video and image gallery
